page.title: 17Naomi's day on Papa Stour.
page.content: I got up rather late this morning _ quarter to nine!I ate my "Start" cereal and rushed to school arriving at 9.12am.We did maths until play_ time. We played outside and came in and did English. Lunch_time is at 12.30pm. and we had mince and potatoes and jam tart and custard for pudding.After lunch we played fighting each_other. In the afternoon we had art and we made clothes for our"Borrower"people. At half past three we left school and when I got home I played with my orphan lambs ({caddies})and my cat {Sylvester }(he hates the caddies!).I had supper at 8.30,an omlette and start cereal.After that I played my fiddle for a while,then I went to bed. I read{Oor Wullie }in bed .When I was younger I asked if I could have a bucket to sit on like{Oor Wullie}!
